title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 27 May 2012 - XWiki
content:
01:23 <Shaddox> has joined #xwiki  
01:43 <ssavi> has quit  
01:57 <ssavi> has joined #xwiki  
02:29 <@sdumitriu> ries: Ah, wait  
02:29 <@sdumitriu> You're on Glassfish, right?  
02:29 <@sdumitriu> Is that 3.1.2?  
02:30 <@sdumitriu> There's a bug in 3.1.2 which breaks uploads, http://java.net/jira/browse/GLASSFISH-18444  
03:11 <CIA-87> Caleb James DeLisle master \* r0e5947e https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-commons/commit/0e5947e77e307024a047823b1099eb2a0046e2ac / xwiki-commons-core/xwiki-commons-environment/xwiki-commons-environment-standard/src/test/java/org/xwiki/environment/internal/StandardEnvironmentTest.java : [misc] Attempting to fix a brittle test which fails on some platforms. - http://git.io/7H4O8w  
03:36 <Shaddox> has quit  
03:49 <npm> has quit  
03:53 <npm> has joined #xwiki  
04:31 <ries> sdumitriu: yes and yes...  
04:33 <@sdumitriu> The solution is to either use 3.1.1 or use the patched jar from http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-7674  
04:33 <ries> sdumitriu: sounds like I need to go back to 3.1.1  
04:34 <jssolichin> has joined #xwiki  
04:34 <jssolichin\_> has joined #xwiki  
04:47 <ries> sdumitriu: On the glassfish ticket I found a web-core.jar I can use on top of glassfish 3.1.2, so I am going to try that

13:22 <ssavi> has joined #xwiki  
13:23 <ssavi> sdumitriu:  
13:24 <@sdumitriu> Hey ssavi  
13:24 <ssavi> Hi, I tried building it on the latest trunk after fixing the mime type issue but couldn't.  
13:25 <ssavi> I'm getting .......Failed to transfer file: http://nexus.xwiki.org/nexus/content/groups/public-snapshots/org/xwiki/commons/xwiki-commons-pom/4.1-SNAPSHOT/maven-metadata.xml. Return code is: 502, ReasonPhrase:Proxy Error.  
13:26 <@sdumitriu> Yes, that's a server error on our side  
13:26 <@sdumitriu> Nothing you can do about it now  
13:27 <ssavi> yeah..  
13:27 <@sdumitriu> Although, you could manually build the whole repositories  
13:27 <sasinda> Hi all, This is regarding the XWiki Android Platform. I need to save the history of login attempts.Please suggest the best option. 1)Save it in SQLite db. 2)save it in a XML file (we already have simple-xml lib in the xdroid platform). Also I need to keep track of unique login user name pwd combinations so that I can suggest them in the login UI component.I think of using a seperate xml file  
13:27 <sasinda> for unique login combinations with encrypted password in them. Not a pwd hash).  
13:29 <ssavi> hmm. It might take a while.. I'll do that. Thanks sergiu  
13:29 <@sdumitriu> Hi sasinda, I'm not sure which is better  
13:30 <sasinda> thanks sdumitriu. Then I ll do which ever looks more easier.  
13:30 <@sdumitriu> +1
